section_title: Dummy Loads, SWR Meters, Antenna Analyzers
label: sec:dummy-swr

subsections.title: Proper Use
subsections.label: subsec:proper-use
prompts: Explain the primary purpose of a dummy load and its role in preventing signal transmission during tests.
Describe the components of a dummy load and how it is constructed to handle power dissipation.
Discuss the function of an antenna analyzer in determining antenna resonance at a desired frequency.
Explain what an SWR reading of 4:1 indicates and its implications for impedance matching.
Describe what happens to power lost in a feed line and how it affects system performance.
